item.description: Bring your friends and family for a wonderful afternoon of music, networking and peace building...  featuring Kate Callahan, MIRA, Francesco Barone and the Lift Every Voice and Sing Gospel Choir.  There will be panel discussions on Food Justice and Local, Sustainable Economies and fun for the kids with face painting, "Chalk for Peace" and free ice cream!  Come at 12:15PM to be a part of the "Parade to the Peace Pole", with the International Peace Belt and giant Peace Dove, drumming and chanting. (Park on Maplewood Ave and join the parade from the back of the building.)  Indoor/outdoor event, rain or shine... "we gotta hope out loud that a peaceful world is possible!"
item.name: 11th Annual Hope Out Loud Peace Festival!
